TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
!puos teid ,og upy ereH

waiter! Is this cup in soup for basils tomatoes?

150809052023

new page!

Edited September 5, 2023 by AlamoVampire

It is their tasting cup. They must have had slippery fingers.

Waiter, some foamed chocolate soup please.

A moment, please. I'll bring a tube of construction foam to add into you hot chocolate.

Waiter! Is the moon shining here?

No not tonight but come back on Wednesday and then maybe it will.

Waiter there's Liquid methane in my soup!

Ah yes, liquid methane and pasta, very nice choice!

waiter! Theres a bisque in my bisque!

155109062023

Yes it is specialty of the house to have what you ordered in your bowl. This is not Jebs Diner you know.

Waiter, can you 3d print soup?

Sir, im a waiter not a printer! But our chef says they can 3d print a bowl but not your soup. You need FedEx Soup for that part

waiter! Theres chowder in my bisque!

085909072023

Sorry sir, we thought you ordered a chowder bisque. Do you want us to change it?


Waiter! there's a simulation of soup in my soup!

You have ordered Error 404 Soup Not Found.

waiter! There is soup in my bisque that has chowder in my broth!

175109082023

Sorry, we had an earthquake, things slopped around quite a bit.

Waiter, can you remember what I ordered when I first entered here (2 years ago)?

Edited September 9, 2023 by ColdJ

Ahh, I remember so clearly. You ordered our famous soup, and you then told us:

On 7/8/2021 at 4:25 AM, ColdJ said:

Waiter there is a quantum singularity in my soup!

Waiter, there's a TOTM Nominee in my soup!

Please sir, remove your thumb from the soup.

Waiter, can you see the future in soup?

Yes. It will be on your head, if you keep asking stupid questions.

Waiter! Which university have you  graduated from?

Earth 42.

Waiter, this soup seems unstable.

It seems that the Center of Lift is above the Center of Mass. Some larger fins and a couple reaction wheels should do the trick.

Waiter, there's cheese in my cream!

Well yes, its cream cheese after all.

sir theres traffic in my soup

160809152024

That's our Los Angeles soup.

Waiter, there's 101 dalmatians in my soup.

Ah the Cruella soup, nice choice!

waiter! Theres a bisque in the chowder thats in my cheese soup.

170409152023

Fascinating combination, sir.

Waiter, this hardtack is too hard and tacky!

Sorry, sir, but our airline provides only fresh Hardtack meals.

Spoiler

Hardtack I Poplar


Waiter! A jellyfish with beans, please. I want jellybeans.

Sorry sir we are not serving that dish today. The fisherman got hungry and peanut butter and jellyfish sandwiches in jellyfish fields.

 

waiter! Theres no movement in my gagh

232109302023

That's our squid-ink pasta.

Waiter! One 3D printed cheesecake, please.

Did you bring the stl file and a 500 hour ad you must watch before printing begins?

waiter! Why is my bowl glitching?

155510012023

There are bugs in it.

Waiter! Two pieces of hydrogen ice, pleas.

Sorry sir we are fresh out of hydrogen ice, we do have methane ice however.

waiter! Theres food in my soup!

192810022023
